claim: Steven Soderbergh directed a biographical film and received acclaim.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Steven Andrew Soderbergh  (  -LSB- ˈsoʊdərbɜrɡ -RSB- born January 14 , 1963  )  is an American film producer , director , screenwriter , cinematographer and editor .

claim: Steven Soderbergh directed a biographical film and received acclaim.
premise_source_doc_sentence: His indie drama Sex , Lies , and Videotape  (  1989  )  won the Palme d'Or at the Cannes Film Festival , and became a worldwide commercial success , making the then-26-year-old Soderbergh the youngest director to win the festival 's top award .

claim: Steven Soderbergh directed a biographical film and received acclaim.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Film critic Roger Ebert dubbed Soderbergh the `` poster boy of the Sundance generation '' .

claim: Steven Soderbergh directed a biographical film and received acclaim.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He is best known for directing critically acclaimed commercial Hollywood films including the crime comedy Out of Sight  (  1998  )  , the biographical film Erin Brockovich  (  2000  )  , the crime drama film Traffic  (  2000  )   (  for which he won the Academy Award for Best Director  )  , the 2001 remake of the comedy heist film Ocean 's 11 and its two sequels -- known collectively as the Ocean 's Trilogy , the medical thriller Contagion  (  2011  )  and the comedy-drama Magic Mike  (  2012  )  .

claim: Steven Soderbergh directed a biographical film and received acclaim.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He has also directed smaller , less conventional works , such as the mystery thriller Kafka  (  1991  )  ; the experimental comedy film Schizopolis  (  1996  )  , which has a non-linear narrative ; Bubble  (  2005  )  , which uses no script and non-professional actors ; the experimental drama film The Girlfriend Experience  (  2009  )  , which starred the then-active pornographic actress Sasha Grey ; and the biopic about Marxist revolutionary Ernesto `` Che '' Guevara , Che  (  2008  )  .

claim: Steven Soderbergh directed a biographical film and received acclaim.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Soderbergh also directed , photographed and edited all episodes of the television drama The Knick .

claim: Steven Soderbergh directed a biographical film and received acclaim.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In addition , he has produced numerous film and television programs , and provided cinematography and editing on various projects .

claim: Steven Soderbergh directed a biographical film and received acclaim.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 2000 , Roberts played the eponymous environmental activist in the Steven Soderbergh-directed biographical film Erin Brockovich .

claim: Steven Soderbergh directed a biographical film and received acclaim.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Erin Brockovich is a 2000 American biographical film directed by Steven Soderbergh and written by Susannah Grant .

claim: Steven Soderbergh directed a biographical film and received acclaim.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Soderbergh directed two sequels , Ocean 's Twelve in 2004 and Ocean 's Thirteen in 2007 , which make up the Ocean 's Trilogy .

claim: Steven Soderbergh directed a biographical film and received acclaim.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Bubble is a 2005 film directed by Steven Soderbergh .

claim: Steven Soderbergh directed a biographical film and received acclaim.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The 2001 film was directed by Steven Soderbergh and features an ensemble cast including George Clooney , Brad Pitt , Matt Damon , Don Cheadle , Andy García , and Julia Roberts .
